author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...BERYL CONTINUING TO RAPIDLY INTENSIFY... ...FORECAST TO BRING LIFE-THREATENING WINDS AND STORM SURGE TO THE  WINDWARD ISLANDS AS AN EXTREMELY DANGEROUS HURRICANE...
summary:
...BERYL CONTINUING TO RAPIDLY INTENSIFY... ...FORECAST TO BRING LIFE-THREATENING WINDS AND STORM SURGE TO THE  WINDWARD ISLANDS AS AN EXTREMELY DANGEROUS HURRICANE...
 As of 5:00 AM AST Sun Jun 30
 the center of Beryl was located near 10.7, -53.1
 with movement W at 21 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 981 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 100 mph.
